metadata.title: CVE-2024-12088 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
[--safe-links Bypass]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-12088` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

rsync - 3.2.7-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rsync package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.2.7-1ubuntu1.1').
